{{cpp/chrono/title|1=operator==,&lt;=&gt;{{small|(std::chrono::month)}}}}
{{cpp/chrono/month/navbar}}
{{dcl begin}}
{{dcl header|chrono}}
{{dcl|since=c++20|num=1|1=
constexpr bool operator==( const std::chrono::month&amp; x,
                           const std::chrono::month&amp; y ) noexcept;
}}
{{dcl|since=c++20|num=2|1=
constexpr std::strong_ordering operator&lt;=&gt;( const std::chrono::month&amp; x,
                                            const std::chrono::month&amp; y ) noexcept;
}}
{{dcl end}}
Compare the two {{lc|std::chrono::month}} {{c|x}} and {{c|y}}.

{{cpp/note synthesized compare}}

===Return value===
@1@ {{c|1=unsigned(x) == unsigned(y)}}
@2@ {{c|1=unsigned(x) &lt;=&gt; unsigned(y)}}

===Example===
{{example
|code=
#include &lt;chrono&gt;

int main()
{
    constexpr std::chrono::month m1{6}, m2{8};

    static_assert
    (
        m1 &lt; m2 &amp;&amp; m1 == m1 &amp;&amp; m1 &lt;= m2 &amp;&amp;
        m2 &gt; m1 &amp;&amp; m2 != m1 &amp;&amp; m2 &gt;= m1 &amp;&amp;
        m1 &lt;=&gt; m2 != 0
    );
}
}}
